      • setTile

        public void setTile(java.util.BitSet bitSet,
                    java.lang.String typ,
                    int numbertoken)
        Set a new terrain with numbertoken
        Parameters:
        bitSet - place
        typ - kind of terrain ("desert", "field", "forest", "hill", "mountain", "pasture", "sea")
        numbertoken - numbertoken for each tile

      • initBoard

        public void initBoard()
        Initialize ArrayBoard and all lists, neighbors and ids use after calling the method setTile() for all tiles

      • setHarbor

        public void setHarbor(java.util.BitSet sea,
                      java.util.BitSet terrain,
                      java.lang.String typ)
        Set harbor use after calling the method initBoard()
        Parameters:
        sea - sea, where the harbor is set
        terrain - terrain next to the harbor
        typ - harbortyp ("generic", "brick", "lumber", "ore", "grain", "wool")
